ngiemboon: Pi pʉ̀a Ngalasia, tsye legye sí pyě ka? Awɔ̌ ka lɔg lekàŋ ḿbue gẅí pɛ́ʼɛ̀? Tá mbà mé ka nyɛte shwóŋo gẅí nò na legwé Yěsô Keleto tà á gwɔ́ páʼ fʉ̀ʼ gie pi lɔ̌g nÿɔ́g mí ńgyá yé na tÿǒnkǐ la.
en: You foolish   Galatians! Who has cast a spell on you,  # 3:1 Other mss add not to obey the truth before whose eyes Jesus Christ was publicly portrayed  # 3:1 Other mss add among you as crucified?  # 3:1 Mt 27:22

ngiemboon: N ge zɛ́te gẅí tàʼa nò. Pi ka lɔg pɔ́ páʼ pi ka ne ńgÿo mmó gie lepʉ̌ ne ńzɛ́te, tá Ssé náa Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a né pi keen? Kà pi ka lɔg pɔ́ páʼ pi jǔʼ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo ńzáb ntʉ́m mǒ, tá Ssé ná né pi?
en: I only want to learn this from you: Did you receive the Spirit by the works of the law or by believing what you heard?

ngiemboon: Legye sí gáa ḿbyé pɔ́ nzẅìŋ wɔɔn? Á gǎa ammó gie pi la lɔg metʉ̀ Zẅìge Ssé ńzye, pi piŋ ńcʉ́ʼ ńgwɔ́ fʉ̀ʼɔɔn ńne faʼa lélɔg pɔ́ mí metʉ̀ tá ḿmege?
en: Are you so foolish? After beginning by the Spirit, are you now finishing by the flesh?

ngiemboon: Pi kwǎŋ ngie menò mie pi lǎ gyá, pi lɔ̌ɔn ńgyá pɔ́ sẅɛ̀ɛ sẅɛ̀ɛ lá?
en: Did you experience  ,# 3:4 Php 1:29 so much for nothing #— #if in fact it was for nothing?

ngiemboon: E Ssé ne ńnáa Zẅìge yé né pi, ḿbiŋe ne ńgÿo menò mɔɔnmɔɔn tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi. Pi kwǎŋ ngie à gÿo púʼu, mélàʼmie pi ne ńgÿo mmó gie lepʉ̌ ne ńzɛ́te lá? Ngǎŋ, à gÿo pɔ́ mélàʼmie pi la júʼ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo ńzáb ntʉ́m gẅí mǒ.
en: So then, does God give you the Spirit and work miracles   among you by your doing the works of the law? Or is it by believing what you heard #— #

ngiemboon: Aŋwàʼne Ssé zɔɔn ńgɔɔn ngie Ábalaham la lɔg yé pɔ́ lézáb ntʉ́m na Ssé, tá Ssé fó na páʼ à zǎb ntʉ́m wé na yé púʼu, ńzẅíŋe yé páʼ nyìŋ gẅie aa mvfò yé ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋndʉŋ.
en: just like Abraham who believed God,    and it was credited to him for righteousness?  # 3:6 Gn 15:6,# 3:6 Gn 15:6

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, pi zsé ngie epʉ̀a pie é záb ntʉ́m wɔ́b na Ssé, zɔɔ kwàʼ ngẅɛ̀ gie e Ssé la kaʼa mbwó Ábalaham.
en: You know, then, that those who have faith, these are Abraham’s sons.

ngiemboon: Aŋwàʼne Ssé la zɔɔn ńtʉ́ njÿó ńnyɛ ngie: E Ssé ge láʼ fó na páʼ pʉ̀a pie é té pà Yúndà wɔ́, ge láʼ záb ntʉ́m na yé, à zẅíŋe wɔ́b páʼ pʉ̀a pie ée mvfò yé ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋndʉŋ. Áa yɛ̌ tá Ŋwàʼne Ssé la tʉ́ njÿó ńtsẅi wɔɔn nkʉ̀ mbòŋo mbwó Ábalaham ngie: E Ssé ge láʼ cʉa pɔ́ na gù, é néŋ mbʉ́lè na meláʼ ntsèm mie ée ndùmo ssé tsetsáʼ.
en: Now the Scripture saw in advance that God would justify the Gentiles by faith and proclaimed the gospel ahead of time to Abraham,   saying, All the nations   # 3:8 Or Gentileswill be blessed through you.   # 3:8 Gn 12:3; 18:18,# 3:8 Gn 12:3; 18:18

ngiemboon: Ábalaham la záb ntʉ́m na Ssé, e Ssé néŋ mbʉ́lè na yé. Púʼu la, epɛ̌ pʉ̀a wɔ́ɔ pie é zǎb ntʉ́m na Ssé páʼ Ábalaham la, e Ssé ge néŋ mbʉ́lè na pɔ́b yɔ́b.
en: Consequently, those who have faith are blessed with Abraham,   who had faith.  # 3:9 Or with believing Abraham

ngiemboon: E Ssé zɔɔn ńnéŋ pɔ́ ndòon twó pʉ̀a pie é lɔgɔ légɔɔn ngie pɔ́ kúʼte lepʉ̌ ńdɔg ńgÿo yɔ́b kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ, á nue Ŋwàʼne Ssé gɔɔn ngie: Nyìŋ lɔɔn te kúʼte lepʉ̌ pɔ́ ntsèm, ńgwɔ́ ngwòŋ fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm ńne ńgÿo pɔ́ mmó gie áa tsɛ̀ɛ ŋwàʼne lepʉ̌ wɔ́, mbà ngàŋ kǎa ndòon.
en: For all who rely on the works of the law are under a curse,   because it is written,  # 3:10 Ac 15:15 Everyone who does not do everything written in the book of the law is cursed.   # 3:10 Dt 27:26,# 3:10 Dt 27:26; Rm 4:15

ngiemboon: Mé gíŋ ńnyɛte ńnyɛɛ tsɛ̀ɛ Ŋwàʼne Ssé ngie ngwɔ́ nyìŋ le lɔg páʼ à gɔɔn ngie à kúʼte lepʉ̌, ńdɔg ńkuʼu nyìŋ gẅie aa mvfò Ssé ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋndʉŋ wɔ́. Á nue mé la ŋweʼe ngie: Nyìŋ gẅie à kuʼu légwɔ́ mvfò Ssé ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋndʉŋ mélàʼmie à zǎb ntʉ́m wé na yé, zɔɔ nyìŋ gẅie à ge láʼ gwɔ́ wó.
en: Now it is clear that no one is justified before God by the law, because the righteous will live    by faith.   # 3:11 Hab 2:4,# 3:11 Hab 2:4

ngiemboon: Á zɔɔn ńgwaa gwɔ́ lekuʼté lepʉ̌ tá ńgwɔ́ wó, à te pumte na lezǎb ntʉ́m na Ssé wɔ́. Á gʉa na nò lepʉ̌, mbà mé la ŋweʼe ngie: Nyìŋ gẅie à ge láʼ kúʼte lepʉ̌ sɔ́ɔn ntsèm zɔ ge láʼ gwɔ́ wó.
en: But the law is not based on faith; instead, the one who does these things will live by them.   ,# 3:12 Lv 18:5

ngiemboon: Táʼ, páʼ mánzsè we lepʉ̌ gÿo pege kaa pɔ́ ndòon la, Keleto la tó ńgÿo pege tsẅɛ́ ndòon ŋwɛ́. À la zyɛ́b ńkaa ḿbiʼ, ńcʉ́ʼʉ ngàŋ ndòon ńtí wégè. Mé gɔɔn nue mé la ŋweʼe ngie: Ndòon ee twó nyìŋ gẅie mé kimé yé na tÿǒ.
en: Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law by becoming a curse for us,   because it is written, Cursed is everyone who is hung on a tree.   # 3:13 Dt 21:23,# 3:13 Dt 21:23; Ac 5:30

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn nò gwɔ́ páʼɔɔn légwɔ́ gie Ssé ge fó na mmó gie Yěsô Keleto gẅie aa na ngẅɛ̀ Ábalaham gÿǒ, é pú néŋ mbʉ́lè na pʉ̀a pie é té pà Yúndà wɔ́, é cʉa na Ábalaham, mbɔɔ légwɔ́ gie pege ge lɔg páʼ pege záb ntʉ́m na Keleto, é gẅiin Zẅìge gie Ssé la kaʼa mbwó pege.
en: The purpose was that the blessing of Abraham would come to the Gentiles by Christ Jesus, so that we could receive the promised Spirit through faith.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, n ge pí fʉ̀ʼ na mà wege pʉ̀a mesoŋ, pege zsě ngie nyìŋ gwɔ́ tà ńŋweʼe mmó ńdɔg ńtÿɔ́g legwé sé na ntí gie á zɛ́te, ńgwɔ́ tsɔ̌ nyìŋ, á le lʉʼ, ńké le gíŋ ńkẅiʼi tsɔ́ mmó mǒ wɔ́.
en: Brothers and sisters, I’m using a human illustration. No one sets aside or makes additions to a validated human will.

ngiemboon: Áa mbwó Ssé ńgíŋ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ púʼu. E Ssé la kaʼa mmó mbwó Ábalaham tà mbɔɔ mbwó nyìŋ gẅie Ábalaham lɔ̌ɔn ńge gÿo zyé yé. Aŋwàʼne Ssé té gɔɔn ngie mé la kaʼa mbwó pʉ̀a pie à lɔ̌ɔn ńge gÿo tá zyé wɔ́b páʼ fʉ̀ʼ gie pʉ̀a pie mé lɔ́ɔn ńkaʼa yɛ̌ mmó á gwɔ́ yɔ́b, é la gyɔ́ɔn gyɔ̌ɔn wɔ́. Ngǎŋ, á la gwɔ́ pɔ́ nò tàʼ nyìŋ. Á nue mé zɔɔn ńtóŋo tsɛ̀ɛ Ŋwàʼne Ssé ngie: Tà mbɔɔ mbwó nyìŋ gẅie ɔ̀ ge gÿo zyé yé. Wɛ̌ nyìŋ piŋ ńgwɔ́ Keleto.
en: Now the promises were spoken to Abraham and to his seed. He does not say “and to seeds,” as though referring to many, but referring to one, and to your seed,   ,# 3:16 Gn 12:7; 13:15; 17:8; 24:7 who is Christ.

ngiemboon: Pi júʼu nò gie mèŋ faʼa légɔɔn. E Ssé la gwaa zye ńkaʼa nò mbwó Ábalaham. Lepʉ̌ láʼ ńgwaa tó, mbà é cʉ̌a ngùʼ nkÿo lekùɔ né móm tá. É ké te gʉa na kʉ̀a yɔ́b Ábalaham ḿbyága tsɔ́ mmó, ńdɔg púʼu, ńgÿo ammó gie à la kaʼa mbwó Ábalaham cʉa sẅɛ̀ɛ wɔ́.
en: My point is this: The law, which came 430 years later,   does not invalidate a covenant previously established by God  # 3:17 Other mss add in Christ and thus cancel the promise.

ngiemboon: Á nue tÿɔgɔ́ gẅie é fóo mbwó Ssé laa péʼe mé zẅɛ́ʼɛ pɔ́ lepʉ̌ tá ńgẅiin, mbà ngwɔ́ é le gíŋ fó na páʼ Ssé la kaʼ wɔ́. E Ssé la zɔɔn ńnéŋe tà fʉ̀ʼ kuʼ, á lɔgɔ mmó gie à la kaʼa mbwó Ábalaham ńdɔg ńcÿó gʉm yé cÿó.
en: For if the inheritance is based on the law, it is no longer based on the promise; but God has graciously given it to Abraham through the promise.

ngiemboon: Ngwɔ́ nyìŋ júʼ ńzɛ́te ngie tà Ssé laa páʼɔɔn ḿbiŋe ńzába lepʉ̌ ńtí pɔ́ kɔ́ wɔ́ɔ? À lɔ̌ɔn ńzába pɔ́ lélɔg ńgÿo nyìŋ fʉa nò, ńzsé ngie à fʉ̌a. Lepʉ̌ la faʼa yé fàʼ tà ńdáʼ ńkú fʉ̀ʼ gie nyìŋ Ábalaham gẅie Ssé la kaʼa mmó ngie áa ye ngàŋ la tó. Á gʉa na sɛ̌ lepʉ̌, mbà Ssé la túm mecÿɔ́ʼ pé, pɔ́ náa mbwó mámekěm.
en: Why, then, was the law given?   It was added for the sake of transgressions  # 3:19 Or because of transgressions until the Seed to whom the promise was made would come. The law was put into effect through angels  # 3:19 Gn 16:7; Mt 13:49; Lk 1:11; Ac 5:19; Rv 14:6 by means of a mediator.  # 3:19 Heb 8:6

ngiemboon: Mé gwaa kíme mámekěm na nò, á lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ nò gie megàŋ té gẅiin shÿó páʼ nò ge kẅɛɛ ncwò nyìŋ, é kúu ncwò wetsɔ̌ wɔ́. Táʼ, á ké ńgʉa na nò gie Ssé la kaʼ la, mbà kwàʼ yé zɔ la tyé ńgɔɔn.
en: Now a mediator is not just for one person alone, but God is one.

ngiemboon: Páʼ áa páʼɔɔn lɔɔn, á lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ngie lepʉ̌ Ssé la pyág shúm sie à la kaʼ kekɔ́ wɔ́ɔ? Ngǎŋ á té púʼu wɔ́. Á la gwéʼe péʼe ńgwɔ́ gie à la ná tsɔ́ lepʉ̌ sie ngwɔ́ é gÿo pʉ̀a mesoŋ gwɔ́ wó, mbà à lɔɔn ngwɔ́ nyìŋ lɔg páʼ à kúʼte lepʉ̌, ńkuʼu nyìŋ gẅie aa mvfò Ssé ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋndʉŋ.
en: Is the law therefore contrary to God’s promises? Absolutely not! For if the law had been granted with the ability to give life, then righteousness would certainly be on the basis of the law.

ngiemboon: Táʼ, aŋwàʼne Ssé nyɛ ngie wɛ̌wɛ̌ nyìŋ wɔ́ɔ, à gwɔ́ pɔ́ nkwɔɔn mbwó nò tepòŋ. Áa páʼɔɔn legwɔ́ gie ammó gie Ssé la kaʼ ge pumte pɔ́ na pʉ̀a pie é cʉa na Yěsô Keleto ńzáb ntʉ́m wɔ́b na yé.
en: But the Scripture imprisoned everything under sin’s power,  ,# 3:22 Rm 6:23 so that the promise might be given on the basis of faith  # 3:22 Rm 3:22 in Jesus Christ to those who believe.  # 3:22 Mk 11:24; Jn 3:16; Ac 10:43; Rm 10:9; 1Pt 1:8–10

ngiemboon: Keleto la gwaa tó tà mé záb ntʉ́m na yé, peg pà Yúndà né ńjúʼu pɔ́ ncwò lepʉ̌ Mǒonsê, é ne ńkwɛ́ɛ wég páʼ mé kwɛɛ megàŋatsǎŋ la tà ńkú na fʉ̀ʼ gie Ssé lɔ̌ɔn ńge gÿo gÿo mé zsé Yěsô Keleto ńzáb ntʉ́m na yé.
en: Before this faith   came, we were confined under the law, imprisoned until the coming faith was revealed.  # 3:23 Lk 10:21

ngiemboon: Lepʉ̌ laa páʼɔɔn ńdɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ páʼ nyìŋ gẅie Ssé la túm, á ne ńdíe wég tà ńkú fʉ̀ʼ gie Keleto ka tó légwɔ́ gie peg ge záb ntʉ́m na yé; é lɔg púʼu, e Ssé cʉ́ʼ ńdíe wég pɔ́ páʼ pʉ̀a pie ée ndʉŋndʉŋ mvfò yé.
en: The law, then, was our guardian until Christ,   so that we could be justified by faith.

ngiemboon: Táʼ, afʉ̀ʼɔɔn gie Keleto ka tó, tà mé ne ńzába ntʉ́m na yé lɔɔn, awɛ̌ nyìŋ gẅie à ka ne ńdíe wég cʉ́ʼʉ ńgẅiin nò na peg wɔ́.
en: But since that faith   has come, we are no longer under a guardian,

ngiemboon: Pi metsèm zɔɔn ńdɔg páʼ pi záb ntʉ́m na Yěsô Keleto ńgwɔ́ púɔ Ssé.
en: for through faith you are all sons of God in Christ Jesus.

ngiemboon: Pi metsèm pie pi la kẅé ntse á gwɔ́ léla nnɛ́ na Keleto, mà Keleto kéen ńjÿó gẅí.
en: For those of you who were baptized into Christ have been clothed with Christ.

ngiemboon: Á fó púʼu, e Ssé te gíŋ ńgÿo tsɔ́ tyɛ̀ʼte na pà Yúndà pâ pʉ̀a Ngelékiya wɔ́, ńké te gíŋ ńgÿo na menkwɔɔn pâ pà ndù nnɛ́ wɔ́, ńké te gíŋ gÿo na mbàŋa pâ panzwě wɔ́, á nue pi lɔg páʼ pi la nnɛ́ na Yěsô Keleto ńcʉ́ʼ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tàʼ ntí.
en: There is no Jew or Greek, slave or free,   male and female;  # 3:28 Rm 10:12; 1Co 12:13; Gl 5:6 since you are all one  # 3:28 Jn 17:11 in Christ Jesus.

ngiemboon: Páʼ pi ee pʉ̀a Keleto la, pi lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ngẅɛ̀ Ábalaham, ńgwɔ́ pagẅiin gí mmó na shúm sie e Ssé la kaʼ.
en: And if you belong to Christ, then you are Abraham’s seed, heirs   according to the promise.  # 3:29 Rm 4:13
